Summary: 2 white disc appearedthen gone30seconds.saw again visible 1 followed the other2 minutes.large cigar shape gollowed half mile behind jet 3 minutes.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ellicott City
There were no other sightings in Ellicott City on or around November 7th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at sunoco.working..after last sighting i watch the sky evry evening from 4.30 pm til alnost dark to my west..after seeing the last few ufos last week i always use my binoculars to be sure of what im looking at...ufo.s...first 2 objects just appeared in the sky.they were visible for about 25 to 35 seconda.. i saw them again about a minute later..1 was higher than the other at about 45 degrees following the 1 in front this lasted about aminute then they were out of sight..the 4 th ufo was following a passenger jet.. when i was watching the sky i saw the jet and realised it was bein followed by something quite larger..i looked closer with my binoculars anit was cigar shaped asout 300 to 400 feet long 30 feet top to bottom it was a silver or chrome it was very shiny..it was traling the passenger jet about a half mile behind this lasted about 2 minutes.. this was so large some one besides myself had to see this..the area im talking about has become a real hot spot for ufos.. a few of my customers have seen ufos in same area..
